channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - tree

item.title: Old Gentoo system? Not a problem...
item.description: If you have a very old Gentoo system that you want to upgrade, you might have some issues with too old software and Portage which can't just upgrade to a recent state. Although many methods exist to work around it, one that I have found to be very useful is â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
